item.title: FORMAL NOTICE to McDonald’s executives - Monopoly sweepstakes is illegal
item.description: From: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.) Subject: FORMAL NOTICE : ILLEGAL LOTTERY USA Date sent: February 14, 2017, 23:21 (Beijing time) To: Chris Kempczinski, Steve Easterbrook, Gloria Santona, Silvia Lagnado, Deborah Wahl THIS EMAIL CONTAINS WHAT I BELIEVE TO BE VERY IMPORTANT LEGAL INFORMATION. DON’T DISREGARD IT! Dear Sir or Madam, This a formal notice to warn you that your McDonald’s Monopoly sweepstakes in the United States actually qualifies, to the best of my knowledge, as an illegal lottery!

item.title: PLEASE STOP THE FRAUD!
item.description: From: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.) Subject: please stop the fraud! Date sent: 2015-10-30 at 22:25 (Beijing time +0800) To: Steve Easterbrook, Gloria Santona, Malcolm Hicks Dear Mr. Easterbrook, dear Ms. Santona, and dear Mr. Hicks, I repeat again. Please stop the fraud. You must make it stop! I know you know this “game” is a fraud under European laws. You can not possibly be so stupid not to understand except if you don’t understand on purpose so that you can later claim plausible deniability.

item.title: Reply from Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: KEY POINT OF THIS EVENT: By acknowledging that McDonald’s Corporation executives “take such inquiries seriously”, McDonald’s Corporation can’t claim plausible deniability anymore. Furthermore, the email from Ms. Santona who is the General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation is CCed to the CEO of McDonald’s Corporation Steve Easterbrook. From: Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com Subject: Re: update Date received：2015-10-21 23:47 (Beijing time +0800) To: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.) Cc: Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com

item.title: Email sent to Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation, requesting an update
item.description: Ms. Santona, I would like to give a friendly reminder that I gave McDonald’s a deadline of October 22nd 2015 midnight GMT time. So you have about 36 hours left. It was 4 entire days which is more than enough considering I’ve sent my first cease and desist letter back in 2012. On top of this, had I known that the French branch had started scamming people again, I would have at the time only given you 24 to 48 hours.
